title: Sausage, Beans and Broccoli Rabe Soup
directions: Heat medium soup pot over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and sausage and brown. Add veggies, bay leaf and beans. Season with salt and pepper. Cook mixture 5 minutes to begin to soften the vegetables. Add rabe and wilt. Add stock and cover pot. Raise heat and bring soup to a boil. Reduce heat to simmer and cook 15 minutes. Adjust seasonings and serve soup with grated cheese, for topping.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 2 turns of the pan
1 large potato, peeled and chopped into small dice
4 cups chopped broccoli rabe and greens
Grated Parmigiano-Reggiano or Romano, to pass at table
